body.name: Hanes Women's Raglan Sleeve Tee, Women’s Stretch Cotton Tee, Women’s Crewneck Tee
features: QUALITY FABRIC - Hanes raglan sleeve tee is made from super soft cotton-rich fabric. The comfortable fabric offers move-with-you style you’re sure to love. (95% Cotton/ 5% Spandex Jersey)
RAGLAN SLEEVES - This classic raglan sleeve style, this 3/4 sleeve tee is ideal for year-round wear.
SCOOPNECK - A flattering design, this raglan sleeve tee is designed with a wide, feminine scoop neckline.
FLATTERING FIT - Hanes raglan sleeve tee offers a shapely, flattering fit that skims your curves without clinging.
MULTIPLE OPTIONS - More choices, more comfort. This raglan sleeve tee is available in an array of colors.
COLD WATER WASH - Hanes recommends machine washing this women's shirt in cold water to help reduce energy consumption.
body.description: Hanes® raglan sleeve tee is made for comfort. It's thoughtfully crafted from super-soft cotton. The classic 3/4 sleeve style features a wide scoop neckline. The shapely design skims your curves without clinging for a flattering fit. Ideal for year-round wear, this soft raglan sleeve tee offers you move-with-you comfort. Hanes® raglan sleeve tee is available in an assortment of colors for even more everyday options.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: MORE OF WHAT YOU LOVE BRAS Underwire or wirefree, Hanes bras deliver the look, fit, lift and support you want without compromising on comfort. SOCKS Hanes socks have been comfort essentials for over 100 years - and treat your feet to the fit. ACTIVEWEAR From our famous Tagless tees and classic sweats. to comfortable performance gear, Hanes has just what you need - workouts to weekends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels comfortable in my Hanes Tshirt
reviews.reviewText: I purchased a 2X. I am 5’6, weigh 180 lbs and my bra size is 38D. The 2X is a PERFECT FIT. In the past I have always liked Hanes Tshirts and I still do. The material is not too thick or thin. The length is great; it reaches about midway my butt and looks good with my leggings. Because I am getting older my arms have a little jiggle so the quarter length sleeves make me feel more comfortable. It comes in a variety of colors and I love the color I purchased but because it fits and feels so nice then I plan to buy several more. It smelled fine and was wearable as soon as I opened the package. I didn’t notice much, if any shrinkage after being washed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Top, Fantastic Price
reviews.reviewText: I had a Hanes shirt I had purchased about 10 years ago and absolutely loved (still going strong!), but it’s finally starting to fade from black to that obviously faded color. It suddenly dawned on me that I should see if that style was still made - we’re talking Hanes here so not a company influenced heavily by the trends - or at least something similar. I found this which looked like it was made of the same comfy, durable, fabric and similar fit with roughly the same neckline and 3/4 length sleeves - all boxes checked plus a killer price! Based on the TruFit model info, I should have ordered the Large (I’m roughly a 12) but I always order up a size because of upper arm issues and I’m not fond of things clinging to my body - I love the comfort of a bit of spandex, but not how it looks when outlining my muffin top! I saw a few reviews saying it ran a bit small and looked at the photos and decided to order up 2 sizes, knowing this fabric and cut (assuming they were as I expected) would be very forgiving on sizing.My XXL came and it was perfect. Same fabric, same sort of fit as my old shirt. If I had the body of my youth and was fine with a more form-fitting top, the L would be a great fit. With my arm issues, the XL would absolutely have fit me and I’d have been happy with it. But the XXL was very comfy and just floats over my body in the middle without being overly loose in the shoulders or hips, the two places it actually contacts the body. It just hangs more in a straight line without accenting the dreaded bulge. With my extra 10+ pandemic pounds, this was exactly what was needed!The fabric is soft and substantial - not at all thin or see-through - and has enough stretch to be comfortable and allow a good fit in several sizes, depending on how tight or loose a top you prefer, flaws you wish to disguise, etc. It’s well-constructed and basic enough to be worn on its own (no jacket) with scarves or jewelry to dress it up a bit, plainer for more casual, and can be layered under sweaters, etc without lots of lumps or discomfort. Length is about mid to lower hip depending on your height and how you chose to size the top. Had I bought the size intended by TruFit, it would definitely have been mid-hip. Two sizes up and it was lower but still not bum-covering enough for leggings IMO.I was happy enough with it that I ordered 3 more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Top runs small.
reviews.reviewText: This top is nice as far as the material goes - it is not sheer at all and the material is a nice weight. It does not cling the way a lot of materials do these days, making it much more flattering. But it does run small, probably because the material doesn't have much stretch, but the manufacturer should've allowed for this, instead of making it for one of these very stretchy, thin, cheap materials that so many garments are made of nowadays. I think clothes makers have forgotten how to make clothes with good material and to fit the way they're supposed to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sizing is off
reviews.reviewText: I ordered a M in the white and black. They came, I washed in cold water and dried in low heat, and tried on. Let me say that I’m 5’5”, 112 lbs, and wear a 36A bra. Basically, I’m on the small size and flat-chested. lol. The shirts fit nicely around my shoulders and the length is good, but the shirts are **snug** around my chest. I thought, Okay I’ll go up a size, so I bought a L in the pink and heather. They came, I washed, and tried on. They are definitely not snug around my chest, but they feel (and look!) to big for me. I guess I need something in between a M and a L, so that means I’m SOL. Oh well, at $11.00/shirt, I’ll wear them to exercise. But I won’t buy any more for jeans, shorts, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Soft, size on point, great 3/4 sleeves. Bought both black and white. Very pleased with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice and soft
reviews.reviewText: Bought it to go with PJ bottoms for my daughter for Christmas. It looks good and washes well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These shirts re vry comfortable and tru to size. They have alot of stretch to them I probably could have ordered one size down

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfy but odd on top
reviews.reviewText: Great t-shirt. Good stretch, good sizing. The only odd thing is that I am "smaller" in the bust area and an XL is kind of big all over on me, expect the bust, it's slightly pulling. So if you have a larger chest, I dont think this is the shirt for you. I would imagine it will pull a lot.
Están muy bonitas las blusas y lo que me gusta es que son de algodón.

reviews.reviewTitle: Always like the Hanes they describe on in amazon...
reviews.reviewText: Hey, i really like this "HANES" top. I ordered one in the light pink. It's a tad darker but still nice. I'm 185lbs & just over 5'6 & ordered a 2x. fits well & very comfortable ~ not see through. I wash everything by hand in cold water & hang to dry so there's no shrinkage. (i use febreeze spray to iron out any wrinkles when i wear an item) You never really know if it's the old Hanes brand that we're used to buying in a store... On Amaz. it always seems like you never get what you see & the fabric sux now... (hard to find cotton anymore) the sizing is always what we read buying a "hanes" product & always arrives quick & on time. Good luck
Es una samarreta que es pot portar com exterior. S'encungeix si la poses a la secadora.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 20, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Fit was good and colour was lovely and bright. Washes well doesn’t require ironing. Nor too short came over my hips. It clings to body not loose. Description does say stretch cotton. Good looking top.
Love the stretch this top gives. Soft breathable fabric. Great for layering or to wear alone.
